description:
An architectural twist on the aviator. With their classic profile, the Watt bring a little modern structure to aviators. With the added structure of the stand-off framed lenses, the Watt get improved coverage and a robust style. Equipped NXT lenses with colourBOOST technology, you get improved clarity and contrast, as well as vibrant colour reproduction.

  • Fits medium to large faces best
  • NXT® lens material offers improved clarity over standard polycarbonate lenses
  • ColourBoost™ lenses deliver vibrant colours and excellent contrast, making them a great choice for challenging light conditions
  • Anti-slip nose pads and temple tips help keep the glasses in place
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 6-base lens curve provides great coverage without restricting air flow
name: Ryders Eyewear Watt Sunglasses
